title: Can't Unlock Permanent Skin
body: I got Fanatic Janna, I own Janna, from a World's orb, I upgraded it to a permanent skin using Orange essence, but it remained in my loot. I tried selecting "Unlock Permanent Skin" and I got a popup saying that my shard popped back out and to try restarting my client. After restarting my client I was unable to select "Unlock Permanent Skin" option. I've been trying for several days and I still can't unlock it. I even tried logging in using a different PC. I've read similar post and none of the solutions worked for me. Help, please. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: It won't let you activate that Fnatic Janna shard because you already own her! Check your collection for that skin and you'll see it unlocked already.
